title.rendered: NPORS Accredited Forklift Truck Training Courses

content.rendered:
FORKLIFT TRUCK TRAINING COURSES

Click Here for a Free Quotation

Forklift Truck Training Courses

Keeping Operators and Drivers Safe and Compliant...

Plant and Safety Limited are industry experts and specialists in providing a wide range of Forklift Truck Training Courses (FLT Training) and Lift Truck Training Courses. 

All of our Forklift Truck training courses Lift Truck training courses are available to both novice and experienced operators, and are designed to provide the necessary knowledge, skills, and qualifications to allow a person to operate Forklift Trucks and Lift Trucks safely and effectively within the work place. 

As a national training provider, we strive to provide the best service, advice, and support possible. We also understand that training can be a challenge for companies to co-ordinate , which is why all of our training courses can be delivered at your own premises using your own equipment. This provides a more flexible, cost effective, and tailored training solution for your business. 

Plant and Safety are proud to employ highly experienced and qualified trainers certified and accredited by industry recognised bodies as NPORS, RTITB, and ITSSAR. 

Counterbalance Forklift Truck Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach Forklift Truck (FLT) Drivers/ Operators how to operate a Counterbalance Forklift Truck safely and effectively within the work place. This course is designed for both new/ novice operators and experienced operators. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Multi-Directional (Side Loader) Forklift Truck Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach Multi-Directional Forklift Truck Drivers/ Operators how to operate a Multi-Directional Forklift Truck safely and effectively within the work place. This course is designed for both new/ novice operators and experienced operators. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Reach Truck Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach Reach Truck Drivers/ Operators how to operate a Reach Truck safely and effectively within the work place. This course is designed for both new/ novice operators and experienced operators. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Rough Terrain Forklift Truck Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach Rough Terrain Forklift Truck Operators how to operate a Rough Terrain Forklift Truck safely and effectively within the work place. This course is designed for both new/ novice operators and experienced operators. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Powered Pallet Truck Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach Powered Pallet Truck Operators how to operate a Powered Pallet Truck safely and effectively  within the work place. This course is designed for both new/ novice operators and experienced operators. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Manual Pallet Truck Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach Manual Pallet Truck Operators how to operate a Manual Pallet Truck safely and effectively within the work place. This course is designed for both new/ novice operators and experienced operators. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

Pallet and Stacker Truck Training Course

Course Objective:

To teach Pallet and Stacker Truck Operators how to operate a Pallet and Stacker Truck safely and effectively within the work place. This course is designed for both new/ novice operators and experienced operators. 

Click Here to Find Out More About This Training Course

WHY CHOOSE PLANT AND SAFETY?


Industry Experts

Our team has extensive experience in providing Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services across all sectors within the UK. Our team of passionate industry experts work closely with our customers to keep their equipment and their people both safe and compliant


Quality Assurance

All of our services are backed by an extensive list of nationally recognised Accreditations and Industry Body Memberships. Our Accreditations and Memberships include ISO 9001, ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001, NPORS, CHAS, Safecontractor, Safe PQQ, ROSPA, and the British Safety Council


National Service Provider

Plant and Safety are a national provider of Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services. Our national team of highly qualified, experienced, and competent trainers and engineers work closely with our customers to keep equipment and people both safe and compliant


Online Inspection Database

All of our Testing, Inspection, and Certification customers are automatically granted with access to our online inspection database to download examination reports for any equipment certified by Plant and Safety. Our inspection database runs on the industry leading ‘Motion Kinetic’ software



Get a Free Quote for Your Forklift and Lift Truck

Training Course Today

ACCREDITATIONS & MEMBERSHIPS

Plant and Safety Limited CHAS Accreditation
Plant and Safety Limited British Safety Council Membership
Plant and Safety Limited ROSPA Membership
Plant and Safety Limited NPORS Approved and Accredited Training Provider

Plant and Safety Limited CHAS Premium Plus Accreditation
Plant and Safety Safecontractor and SafePQQ Accreditation

CONTACT PLANT AND SAFETY LIMITED

T: 0330 113 7920

E: sales@plantandsafety.co.uk

Plant and Safety Ltd, Birmingham Road, Shenstone, Staffordshire, WS14 0LB
